metadata.description: Spells that create, heal, and enhance plants and plant products

spells.name: Conjure the Cottage
spells.description: Creates a sturdy wooden cottage complete with furniture and basic amenities. The structure is well-built and weatherproof.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create wooden structure), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +3 Structure

spells.name: Forest of Abundant Growth
spells.description: Creates a thriving forest in previously barren land. Trees grow to maturity instantly and the forest becomes self-sustaining.

spells.name: Heal the Withered Plant
spells.description: Restores a diseased, withered, or damaged plant to perfect health. The plant regains all lost vitality and begins growing normally.

spells.name: Blessing of Abundant Harvest
spells.description: Ensures that crops in a large area grow exceptionally well, producing three times the normal yield of high-quality food.

spells.name: Bridge of Woven Vines
spells.description: Creates a strong bridge of interwoven vines that can span moderate distances. The bridge is sturdy enough to support several people.

spells.name: Wall of Thorns
spells.description: Creates a thick wall of thorny vines that blocks passage and damages those who try to force their way through.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create defensive plants), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +1 for thorns

spells.name: Create the Perfect Staff
spells.description: Creates a perfectly balanced wooden staff or walking stick. The wood is hard, durable, and comfortable to grip.

spells.name: Garden of Perpetual Spring
spells.description: Creates a beautiful garden that remains in perfect bloom regardless of season or weather. Plants thrive year-round.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create magical garden), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 Room

spells.name: Rope from Nothing
spells.description: Creates a strong rope of any reasonable length from plant fibers. The rope is well-made and suitable for climbing or binding.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (create simple plant product), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Entangling Roots
spells.description: Causes thick roots to burst from the ground and entangle enemies. The roots are strong and difficult to break or cut.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create grasping plants), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Group

spells.name: Tree of Sheltering Boughs
spells.description: Creates a large tree with branches that form natural shelters and hiding places. The tree provides excellent protection from weather.
